about_the_game:
This is a local two-player tank versus tank game where two players control blue and red tanks;

Players can fire bullets of the same color as their tanks by pressing keys:
-Bullets will bounce around the scene.
-If the bullet hits a player of a different color, it will destroy him.
-If the bullet hits a player of the same color, the player picks up the bullet.




Players have a limited number of bullets, so picking them up and reusing them is the key to winning the game strategically;

The game has a built-in versus mode and a mini-game mode:
-Battle mode - Classic map: with obstacles and props
-Battle Mode - Walled Maze: Lots of walls for bouncing bullets
-Battle mode - Open space: without any obstacles and props, suitable for pure versus
-Mini-Game - Last Shot: Player has only one bullet and is limited in range of movement. It's like a cowboy duel
-Mini-Game - Soccer match: Simulates a soccer game, players only need to put the ball into the opponent's goal to win!
-Mini-Game - Dangerous balls: A lot of dangerous gray balls visit the scene, players have to pay attention to avoid these dangerous balls!

The game supports both keyboard and gamepad modes, and if you have two gamepads, it is recommended that you use them to play.

Players can fire bullets of the same color as their tanks by pressing keys:
-Bullets will bounce around the scene.
-If the bullet hits a player of a different color, it will destroy him.

name: ReBullet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10, windows11
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: This is a local two-player tank battle game where two players control blue and red tanks; Players will use a limited number of bullets to eject and defeat enemies in the scenario!
